attributes.action: bring back smoking in pubs and clubs if they wish to chose too.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: people have human rights to smoke if they so wish too. so make pubs and clubs have a chose between being a smoking or a non smoking pub or club or have smoking points in pubs and clubs. in this day and age you can get filter systems that clear the air of smoke in seconds. let people have a say and stop all the pub chains closing down because all the smokers have to stay and drink at home because they have to stand outside in the wind and rain. where are our human rights gone?.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
